about.title: About LearnBasicPy
about.description: LearnBasicPy is a comprehensive Python learning platform designed to help beginners master Python programming through interactive lessons and hands-on practice.

features.title: Interactive Learning
features.description: Learn Python with our interactive code editor that lets you write and execute code in real-time

features.title: Structured Curriculum
features.description: Well-organized lessons covering everything from basic syntax to advanced database operations

features.title: Practical Exercises
features.description: Each lesson includes practical exercises to reinforce your learning

features.title: Database Integration
features.description: Comprehensive coverage of database handling with MySQL and PostgreSQL

features.title: Real-time Feedback
features.description: Get immediate feedback on your code execution and exercises

about.mission: Our mission is to make Python programming accessible to everyone through practical, hands-on learning experiences.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!
